title: I PROMISE YOU (Propose Ver.)
lyrics:
Beojkkoch-i tteol-eojideon nal
Geudael cheoeum mannassjyo
Nachseol-eun tteollimgwa dulyeoun
Seollemdeul-i dwiseokk-ideon nal
Ijeseoya malhaeyo
Na manh-i geob-i nass-eossjyo

Eojjeomyeon geuttaega

Majimag-ilago saeng-gaghaess-eossgie



Seotun nal gaseum-e pum-eojugo

Nal wihae ul-eojun geudae nunbich-eul gieoghae

Simjang-e saegilgeyo



Yagsoghaeyo ij-ji anhgessdago

Nal dasi taeeonage haejun neol

Nae salam-ilan ge jalangseuleoul su

Issdolog jal halgeyo



Yagsoghaeyo nohji anhgessdago

Naege bich-i doeeojun geudaewa

Bomnal-ui ulileul ij-ji anh-eulgeyo

Yagsoghaeyo



Najocha midji moshaessdeon kkum-eul

Ilul su issdago

Nal il-eukyeo judeon geudaega iss-eoseo

I nolael buleugo iss-eo



Salanghandaneun maldo gomabdaneun insado

Nae mam-eul jogeumdo daesinhaji moshae

Ijebuteo geunyang nae mam boyeojulgeyo



Gakkeumssig sangsang-eul hae nan

Neo eobsneun nawa i sesang

Eolmana chagabgo eoduulji dulyeobgiman hae

Youâ€™re my sunshine and moonlight

Eoneu geosgwado bigyobulga

Geunyang Thank you and I just thank you

And I love you



Yagsoghaeyo ij-ji anhgessdago

Nal dasi taeeonage haejun neol

Nae salam-ilan ge jalangseuleoul su

Issdolog jal halgeyo



Yagsoghaeyo nohji anhgessdago

Naege bich-i doeeojun geudaewa

Cheoeum-ui ulileul ij-ji anh-eulgeyo

Yagsoghaeyo



Oeloun sesang-e deoneun

Honja duji anh-eulgeyo

Uliui yeong-won-eun

Ije sijag-il tenikka

Myeoch beon-ui gyejeol-i seuchigo

Sigan-i ulileul jinagado

Seololeul ij-ji malgilo haeyo

I promise you baby

Gieoghaeyo



Najochado mollassdeon naleul al-abwa jwossdeon

Geudaelo inhae jigeum-ui naega iss-eo

Byeolbichboda bichnal taeyang-e angin dallo

Yeong-won-eul yagsoghaeyo I promise you



Yagsoghaeyo deoneun geudaeleul

Nunmuljisge haji anh-eulgeyo

Nae salam-ilan ge jalangseuleoul su

Issdolog jal halgeyo



Yagsoghaeyo byeonchi anhgessdago

Jigeum idaelo salm-ui kkeutkkaji

Cheoeum-ui ulileul ij-ji anh-eulgeyo

Yagsoghaeyo
